issue.title: [Python] Drop Numpy 1.16 support
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15214](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15214). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
If we are following [NEP 29](https://numpy.org/neps/nep-0029-deprecation_policy.html) we can safely drop Numpy 1.16 support (released in 2019), they got unsupported in January 2021 by numpy.
